start.name: System
start.text: You approach the bandit camp. From your position in the deep brush, you can see several guards keeping watch over the area.

sneak_failure.name: System
sneak_failure.text: It is difficult to sneak through the unfamiliar terrain. Terrain that the bandits have had plenty of time to study and fortify. Sneaking forward, you stumble almost directly into a bandit hidden in the underbrush...

sneak_success.name: System
sneak_success.text: It is difficult to sneak through the unfamiliar terrain however you manage to do it. There was a close-call with a pair of bandits hidden in the brush, but you manage to get past the outer perimeter of guards. The camp is open to you.

assassinate.name: System
assassinate.text: Sneaking through the bandit camp, you are successfully able to take out a handful of unaware guards before retreating back to the rest of the party.

map.name: System
map.text: Sneaking through the bandit camp, you make note of locations of interest. You find the main campground, and note a ramshackle Watchtower, a small pool of fresh water, and a large fire pit.
